job_title: Architect with Asset & Wealth Management exp

Asset/Wealth Management experience is a mustFinancial Services backgroundResponsibilities: Target Architecture of the applicationTech Leadership across Client TeamsBuild a tech roadmap for the productProvide Tech Leadership to the implementation team for migration of D&C’s on-prem EWS application to cloud We need a solid .NET Architect with experience in building UI-based applications (React/Angular), Winforms/WCF on Azure Cloud.Must have played a role of Sr. ArchitectMust have a solid communication to collaboratively drive buildingTarget Architecture of the applicationTech Leadership across Client TeamsBuild a tech roadmap for the productProvide Tech Leadership to the implementation team for migration of D&C’s on-prem EWS application to cloudAWM experience required (asset and wealth management)
